component.name: createIssueLink
component.description: Creates an issue link between two issues

component.name: getIssueLink
component.description: Returns a issue link given the link id

component.name: deleteIssueLink
component.description: Deletes a issue link given the link id

component.name: getIssueLinkTypeById
component.description: Returns an issue link type given the link type id

component.name: deleteIssueLinkType
component.description: deletes an issue link type given the link type id
